ygData.subject: Re: Words of Quivering
ygData.msgSnippet: Its not all random what and where you get certain reaserch componets. I know certan npc s have words alot more often then any thing else. Words are reaserch
ygData.messageBody:
Its not all random what and where you get certain reaserch componets. I
know certan npc's have words alot more often then any thing else.


Words are reaserch components for Necromancers.

Necrosaro




> It's random on what creatures you get spell research components. As
> for what word, I believe he said it was words of Quivering. Tandayen,
> Dark Elf Wizard
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Lecouffe <puma@...>
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 10:46 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Words of QuiveringWhat kind
> of creture and where was this that you got this word of
> power and what word of power was it?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 10:25 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Words of
> QuiveringIt's a spell research component, offer it
> up to a magic user. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rob Wiltbank <chade@...>
> To: eq_spell_research@onelist.com
> <eq_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 8:43 AM
> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Words of
> QuiveringHey there, folks.. Looking for
> some info.. I was fighting a creature
> and pulled off a scroll looking object
> called Words of Quivering -- all classes
> and races, no way to read or scribe it.
> The vendors would buy it for several
> plats, I think it may be a research
> component, any ideas? ChadePovar
>
